name: Drive Horse In City Simulator
description:
Drive Horse In City Simulator - a game simulator ride a horse in the city. First-person view. Manage your horse between the streets, look for food supply. What would need to move horse feed. Learn and explore the city, street, amusement park, lake and much more. Be careful in the city a lot of traffic do not fall under the car! Will appeal to all. Everyone loves animals and riding on horseback. The game is completely free now and without an internet connection.
Thank you for playing with us, leave us your feedback and suggestions and we will make our game more unique with updates!
